sentences.sContent: Belushi imitates a giant pimple by squeezing his cheeks and spewing chewed food out of his mouth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Belushi imitates a giant pimple by squeezing his cheeks and spewing chewed food out of his mouth.
sentences.sCn: 我们在等候某个毕业生领文凭的同时，可以欣赏像《动物屋》这样与学校有关的经典电影的片断：约翰-贝鲁西模仿一个脸上长满丘疹的巨人，双手挤着脸，从嘴里喷出嚼过的东西。

words.tran: 肿泡的；有丘疹的；有疙瘩的

trans.tranOther: a small raised red spot on your skin, especially on your face
